title: ISic000468. A dedication to the Caesars by L. Caelius Quadratus
body:
Facsimile Images

1CAESARIB
2SACRUM
3LCAELIUSMF
4QUADRATUS
5DSP

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of CIL

English translation

Sacred to the Caesars. Lucius Caelius Quadratus, son of Marcus (dedicated this) at his own expense

commentary

The inscription appears to be lost, recorded first in Fazello 1558

bibliography

  • Fazello 1558 Dec. 1, book 5, p.23 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002606
  • 10.7191 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Schubring 1873 75 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002684
  • Manganaro 1988 47 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
